name: Super Choppy Orc
description:
Super Choppy Orc is a 2D precision/puzzle platformer about the journey of an Orc and his magical Axe. Escape the monster infested caves and free your friends along the way.

Gameplay


Unlock the chest in every level to release the people that are locked inside.
Throw your Axe at EVERYTHING!!!
It can be used as a platform to boost you up...


can make you double jump...


can make you float...


and of course, it can destroy your enemies...

Features

  • Classic arcade pixel art and gameplay.
  • Tight and responsive controls.
  • Wonderful retro catchy music.
  • Speedrun friendly design.
  • Colourblind & more accessibility options.
